website_summaries.verdict: Despite a few concerns, this bag is attractive and roomy. However, there are other choices that offer either better quality or a lower price point.
pros: Features a nonslip shoulder strap that is simple to adjust and detachable when not in use
Looks good and comes in 4 color options
cons: The wheels don't feel very sturdy
You might have to check it when flying

customer_reviews.title: Great inexpensive garment bag.
customer_reviews.text: This bag worked great for travel. I was able to get a tux,suit and 5 dress shirts and 4 pairs of dress pants in with room to spare with no wrinkling. I'm 6'5" so clothes are long.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Young

customer_reviews.title: Not for Air Travel
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfectly good bag for storage and keeping suits and shirts (somewhat) wrinkle-free. The problem is that TSA is cracking down and this will never be considered carry-on anymore. The cheaper plastic combined with airport baggage handlers, and you'll be lucky to get more than 5 flights out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Matt B.

customer_reviews.title: The Zipper Is The Weak Link - Contents Have Spilled Out Because of Faulty Zipper
customer_reviews.text: I have used this suitcase about a dozen times and the last two times, it has come down the luggage shoot with the zipper split open and contents falling out. The last time that the zipper split open it contained one suit, dress two shirts, a pair of slacks and two polo shirts, all on hangers. It was not overfilled and having to zip and unzip the zipper while on my hands and knees hoping it will re-zip is a royal pain and very embarrassing, not to mention items that have spilled out and were lost.
customer_reviews.author: The Balkan Trader

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Update: After contacting company, they replaced damaged item with a new one. Great Customer Service. I took a chance on this product based on all the great reviews it received. However, on my first use the bottom stitching came off. Can't return or replace as window is over. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Pinzon

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the infrequent traveler
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the infrequent traveler. Initially I was concerned the three suits I traveled with would wrinkle due to the inner design of this piece. But having used this piece three times in one month, I was pleasantly surprised my jackets & pants remained fresh. TRAVELERS TIP: Before packing, have your dry cleaner press (or clean) each suit and wrap separately in plastic. Keep the plastic around each suit - it helps with preventing wrinkles while the luggage is in transit. Lastly, I was able to pack an overcoat (which did wrinkle a bit due to its length), 3 suits (and matching pants) and two slacks. Any more items and you're rolling the dice.
customer_reviews.author: Tull1

customer_reviews.title: Week zipper, prone to bust open
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely hate to write negative reviews. The spaciousness, pockets, rolling ability, extended handle, etc worked great. Problem is the zipper is extremely weak and breaks open. I've now traveled with it 3 times, and 2 of those times it has busted open completely with my clothes fully exposed and touching the ground and the conveyor belt, cetera. Really wish I hadn't bought this bag.
customer_reviews.author: G. Dean

customer_reviews.title: Some quirks, but overall excellent !!!
customer_reviews.text: Have now made half a dozen trips -- minimal signs of wear -- everything still functions. Pocket access (both inner and outer) can be a challenge (upside down at times) -- but it holds an extended weekend wardrobe + footwear + computer + tablet + shave/shower kit + camera + small sleeping bag ... and there's room for more ... (not enough room for the kitchen sink -- but. almost !!!) Hoping it remains as durable as it seems !!!
customer_reviews.author: Peter Vattimo

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice bag
customer_reviews.text: This garment bag has now travelled all over the U.S. and round trip to Ghana, and apart from a couple of stains, there is only one small seam separation on the smaller, outside pocket. It is the only reason I gave it 4 stars, but for the price of the bag, I am completely disregarding it. I have packed it with two suits, two additional pair of pants, several shirts, shaving kit, and two pair of shoes (It has neat mesh side pockets that hold shoes - as long as they are smaller than 12s).
customer_reviews.author: Michael Holly

customer_reviews.title: I had the first one for about 3 years and feel like I got my money's worth
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time buying this garment bag. I had the first one for about 3 years and feel like I got my money's worth. This time around, I bought and the zipper broke immediately but the other side still worked so I didn't sweat it. Then the front just burst open when I picked up the bag. Previously, it was more of a zipper problem after three years (which I feel like I got my money's worth) but now this bag ripped wide open. Guessing I have to spend more to get a something that will work better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon'r

customer_reviews.title: wrong orientation- clothes hang upside down
customer_reviews.text: hmmm. your clothes hang upside down- as in, when you are rolling your stuff around, the hanger part is down, by the wheels side. this seems pretty arse-backwards to me- your clothes should "hang" from the hanger when its upright otherwise they'll just end up in a pile near the hanger. I travel a lot (3-4x month) and have been through many suitcases. I'll use this until it breaks because I really need it for a trip and don't have time to order a different one. I suspect it'll break soon enough. If I can use as a carryon, it might last a year, but it's not going to be my "go-to" bag as I'd hoped. Still looking...
customer_reviews.author: mark.nickerson

customer_reviews.title: Just received my new bag and getting ready to use ...
customer_reviews.text: Just received my new bag and getting ready to use the for the first time. I packed 3 complete outfits, with shoes, all toiletries along with some extras and still have a lot of room left. So far, very pleased--we'll see how well it travels. Is not a carry-on! Probably won't use very often as I don't think it will hold up to baggage handlers. I still like the concept but needs much improvement. Too wide and could use 360-wheels.
customer_reviews.author: erwat

customer_reviews.title: Pass, unless you're severely budget-constrained
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent bag, but in the end I didn't keep it. It did fine holding two suits and keeping them free of any wrinkles. I just had too many concerns with its durability. The zippers didn't seem like they would last long. Either the zipper might break or come unthreaded from the bag itself. Pockets were somewhat lacking too. It would have been nice to put a couple in the corners where suit shoulders aren't using space. Otherwise I really liked that it had a strap to hold your carry on, so you can roll them simultaneously. That's a great feature since this bag is so wide and can be unruly in the airport.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Talbot

customer_reviews.title: My go to case for Traveling
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this garment bag for traveling. When recently traveling out of state to a wedding, i was able to get 2 dresses, 2 sports coats, a suit, 2 pairs of shoes and several casual tops. There are multiple pockets for storing additional things and it has a handle to pull on it's wheels. If flying, it is too big to carry on, but who cares??? This bag dramatically reduced the number of bags we needed to take. It is also very sturdy. The price was surprisingly low for the value!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Susan J.

customer_reviews.title: Zipper broke on 2nd trip
customer_reviews.text: The bag is beautiful and fits quite a lot in it. I read the negative reviews but let the 5-star reviews sway me. Shame on me! On only its 2nd trip, the zipper broke and the bag popped open in the airport! Thank goodness we were on our way home and we had everything strapped down or zippered in. We had to buy a suitcase belt to keep the bag together. Please note that we were not going in and out of hotels/locations and subjecting the bag to heavy use. On the first trip, we had 2 destinations; the second trip only one! The zipper should have lasted many years.
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: Satisfactory garment bag.
customer_reviews.text: We used this once for a air trip cross country. We stuffed into the bag two suits, two dress shirts, four short sleeved shirts, a pair jeans, an evening gown and men’s dress shoes. Hubby underutilized the pockets so I’m sure you could put more in the bag. Despite the rough handling you can expect at the airport, all items arrived in wearable condition. The bag is fairly narrow but too big for a carry-on. I can’t report on durability; I can only say it held up for a round trip cross country.
customer_reviews.author: Bead lover Linda

customer_reviews.title: Very practical, great addition to luggage
customer_reviews.text: This is great - has a hook for hanging things, inside separated storage, outside compartments. My daughter will use this to travel around and for a weekend, she can put everything she needs in this one thing. The rolling part is really nice because these can get heavy when you start putting much in. I saw these on base for more than twice as much so a good price here. Seems sturdy but she needs it for just a year and if it lasts beyond that, it will be a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: A good bag for the price point
customer_reviews.text: I was working the floor at a medical convention and needed a bag to get all my pressed shirts where I was going. This bag fit the bill at a decent price. The construction is good for the price-point and I especially like the pockets for your shoes which kept the black polish off my white shirts. Only issue I have is that the the extending handle is a bit weak when you strap a second bag to it. It flexes some and feels like it might bend or break. Also the handle does not lock when fully extended so it is pull only as pushing causes the handle to retract. All in all a good bag for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Sliceman

customer_reviews.title: Great Combo of Quality and Price!
customer_reviews.text: Some of the reviews of this product ding it as far as durability. I’ve taken this to Paris as a carry-on and then to Australia and New Zealand as checked luggage and it’s still in perfect shape. I packed my military uniforms in it for all three trips and they arrived crisp and ready to wear. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: TX_Hokie

customer_reviews.title: For the Price, It Was Good
customer_reviews.text: My partner purchased this through my account because I am a Prime Member and get free shipping or faster shipping! He and I went on a trip up to the Pittsburgh area for a wedding and needed a garment bag to carry our suits. This did the trick well and did not bust the bank either. I would not recomend this for a frequent business traveler but will recomend this for someone who needs to travel with a suit or jackets once in a while. It is plain and it is simple to use and that is what we needed.
customer_reviews.author: DVJLuna

customer_reviews.title: While the packaging was in bad state, a carrier issue
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for a friends birthday present as she always wants something practical she can use. It came in and I was incredibly worried as the package had multiple tears and holes in it so opened it up to check on it. While the packaging was in bad state, a carrier issue, the product itself is wonderful. For the price I was worried it might be cheap etc but wanted to give it a try and so glad I did. It's well made, solid material and works wonderfully. My roomate is ecstatic over this as she's a movie extra and has to take costuming with her on many occasions so this is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Newsom

customer_reviews.title: More spacious than it looks
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this purchase. I was concerned when it arrived that it was far too small for our 5-day trip which included formal and casual clothes. I was pleasantly surprised - the bag held everything we needed and more! My husband is a large person and I was able to fit 8 pairs of underwear, 12 extra thick undershirts, 5 button down shirts, 2 pairs of jeans, a suit, 6 pairs of thick cotton socks, and accessories and toiletries.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca J. Wright

customer_reviews.title: I travel often and have been using this rolling garment ...
customer_reviews.text: I travel often and have been using this rolling garment bag weekly since it arrived. It has held up well and holds so much more than others I have had. My only complaint is I want one in olive or green to matches the color of my other luggage and it doesn't come in the color I want.
customer_reviews.author: dnb

customer_reviews.title: Not great but cheap
customer_reviews.text: This garment suitcase is big and bulky. My issue it that it doesn’t fit as a carry on. It has room for 3 hooks for clothes hangers. Unless you stuff it clothes I think it has a lot of space for things to move around. Another issue I have with it is it doesn’t have a foam roll when the fold is to help prevent a crease across your garment. But for the price, it will get the job barring in mind any decent garment suitcase runs over 200 dollars
customer_reviews.author: Vetyaz

customer_reviews.title: Solid Enough
customer_reviews.text: Let's be honest; in this price range you're not buying a suit bag that will last a lifetime. This one will last longer then most, has a good sized pocket on the outside, and has detachable containers on the inside that you can place on the bathroom vanity if it has your toiletries in it or on the mirror dresser if you have socks in it. It protected my clothes while I traveled and did exactly what I expect it to do.
customer_reviews.author: Noteworthy

customer_reviews.title: Great price, versatile, just feels a bit heavy
customer_reviews.text: I have now used this once on a six hour journey. First thing- this is not a carry on item. United did not allow this as a carry on even for business class. I checked it in and it held fine. It is quite spacious. I was able to fit in three shirt/pant pairs, shoes, personal toiletries bag and a few other clots comfortably. It feels strong and sturdy. The wheels and handle feels strong. No complaints so far. If anything, the weight of the empty bag is somewhat heavy but that makes it strong.
customer_reviews.author: bsbeedg

customer_reviews.title: it did the job, but not sure how long it will last
customer_reviews.text: The airline broke our garment bag on our vacation, so we ordered this for the rest of our trip. It seems much flimsier than the one we had. I worry about the retractable handle and how strong it is. It got us home, but I don't expect a long service life from this. However, the price was appealing and it was easier to move than a cardboard box would have been, and that was our other option.
customer_reviews.author: Wild Woman

customer_reviews.title: Not a Good value-was a good value at $35
customer_reviews.text: Update-at$35 this was a great bag. I went to buy another and it is now $50. Quality not good enough for $50. I have lowered rating from 5 to 3. Original post: We bought this to replace an expensive one we bought 20 years ago that finally gave out. For the price, this one is spectacular. We have used it for 1 trip so far. Once you have a rolling garment bag, you will never go back to the flimsy shapeless onesagain.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis H

customer_reviews.title: Best bag ever
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME! Excellent quality and LOADS of room for multiple dresses, shoes and underthings. this bag is my absolute favorite! It's summer and in my house that means sun dresses... when we travel, which we do a LOT, it's great to have the ability to grab the clothes, hangers and all and then just transfer to the closet... or hang the bag. WOW. You must check this bag as it's too wide to get on a plane -that is the only draw back. The quality and construction of this bag is amazing! And the price is an extra bonus
customer_reviews.author: N. Kelleher

customer_reviews.title: For the money you can't beat it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a 2 week business trip overseas and I needed to bring a lot of suits. I also packed a normal suitcase but used this one for my suits - it held up extremely well between Houston and London and back. Was able to fit quite a bit and my suits were left relatively un-wrinkled. Would have preferred "spinners", but for the money this was an ubeatable value.
customer_reviews.author: cpmoshjr

customer_reviews.title: If you’re thinking about it GET IT!!
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend took this on our trip to Vegas and he had to go to Dallas after for 2 days. In total a 6 day trip. He was able to fit 2 suits, 2 suit jackets, all of his under garments and 2 pairs of shoes. His travel bag fit in the inside as well. BEST PURCHASE EVER!!!
customer_reviews.author: Domonique Donalson

customer_reviews.title: As good as the $500 version at a luggage store
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I went to a luggage store in the mall and found a garment bag that was almost exactly the same as this one but the only difference was that they wanted $500. We figured it was worth getting a cheaper one on Amazon and if it broke we had still saved $450. Needless to say this worked out perfectly and didn't break which makes it even better! He was able to get 3 suits (tightly packed) into this garment bag. We flew across the country and it held up really well.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea S

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Easy to Handle
customer_reviews.text: This rolling garment bag was bought for my tween travelling to perform her violin concerto at Disney... I wanted a luggage to hold her gown without it being crushed; and something easy for a young girl to manage... this suitcase accomplished both.. It is sturdy, easy to handle, keeps clothes in good condition, however it cannot fit much items, so that was disappointing.. The color is vibrant & cool enough for a tween, so its a keeper!
customer_reviews.author: JanetR

customer_reviews.title: Great garment bag, but not airline friendly
customer_reviews.text: Even though the concept is really good and the bag was very cheap, it all falls apart if you cant take it as a carry on bag in most planes. It will not fit in overhead compartment and thus requires to check in, which kinda defeats the purpose and might as well get a large luggage. The build quality is what you expect for a cheap price and I cant complaint about that.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Botero

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't handle plane trip
customer_reviews.text: The very first time we used this we couldn't believe how beat up it was when we picked it up from baggage claim. The seams were split in several places. We were able to use it round trip, but we really weren't sure what we would find when we got to baggage claim at home. The seams had split a bit more, but thankfully our clothes were still in the bag. A bag should last more than 1/2 a trip.
customer_reviews.author: Jody Wyant

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a smaller and durable garment suitcase for business and weekend travel. Used it several times, no complaints regards durability or maneuvering. Not sure if it’s me or the suitcase but my cloths are a little wrinkled when unpacking. I have a larger similar suitcase and my garments unpack wrinkle free.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Menolascino

customer_reviews.title: Holds Mucho
customer_reviews.text: After I bought one for myself my wife had to have one. Went on a 14 day cruise and this garment bag holds a considerable amount, which was needed. I first bought a traditional garment bad and then saw this one, made the switch and very happy with my choice. After the trip and accompanying abuse, looks the same as new.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but too small
customer_reviews.text: I needed a garment bag for dress clothes while traveling. This bag was just too small. BEWARE! I GOT CHARGED FOR RETURN SHIPPING WITH MY AMAZON PRIME. Total BS. I rarely do returns. Returns for good reasons has always been free. Going to cancel my Amazon Prime. Update- I contacted Amazon customer service and I am getting a full refund with no shipping charges.
customer_reviews.author: Jim bec

customer_reviews.title: It's not a bad piece but I bought it with the intentions of ...
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't hold many hangers and they have to be very thin wire ones that you use...I don't even own wire ones. It's not a bad piece but I bought it with the intentions of carrying clothes that I wanted hung, and that didn't work for me.
customer_reviews.author: J & B Gol

customer_reviews.title: Best investment I have ever made!
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend this bag to anyone who travels a lot. If you hate taking your clothes off the hanger only to get to where you are going just to hang them back up! I can pack 7 outfits (tops and bottoms) all still on the hanger plus put several pairs of shoes in there too. This is the best investment I have ever made. Plus the price was great!
customer_reviews.author: jabbg4

customer_reviews.title: Did the job
customer_reviews.text: The case was just as described and I liked that it held two suits, shirts and accessories. Nice separate pockets for two pairs of shoes. I will say it was a bit heavy but that also made it durable. Kept items fairly wrinkle free, some wrinkles on mans suit but were able to steam out easily.
customer_reviews.author: M. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: For the price it holds up well for a rolling ...I fly Weekly
customer_reviews.text: For the price it holds up well for a rolling bag. It's too soft to put other luggage on top of it. I've had zero problems placing this in the top luggage racks I have had this bag for several flights now as a carryon. At first I had zero issues using this as a carry on item in large and small airports. For my last few flights the Gate employees are saying it'll take too much space and I had to check my carryon. It will fit in the overhead but due to the length it will take up almost half the overhead. It's a good rolling garment. But for a carryon look for something else
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Does the job for the price.
customer_reviews.text: My dad is a person who usually uses a traditional garment bag on his trips. However, on a recent trip he became ill and couldn't carry a garment bag like usual. I ordered this bag for his return trip. It came quickly with Amazon prime and did the job. I am not giving it five stars just because I'm not sure how long it will hold up long term.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Well Made Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used this luggage yet but out of the box it is very well made and for the price you cant beat it. Will let you know how it travels. Back from vacation, luggage did great! 4 flights and overstuffed on return. Held up really well.
customer_reviews.author: LaDeDa

customer_reviews.title: Nice Garment Bag for the right price
customer_reviews.text: Great bag, only used it once so far but fits a lot of stuff. It went through the check-in process and came out without any damage. I originally thought I would be able to carry this on, but I wasn't allowed to by the airline staff. It might fit, it might not I was never afforded the opportunity to try.
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: Great price and quality, durability!
customer_reviews.text: My husband uses this for work. This is our second purchase in 10+ years; the first was broken by the airline (wheel), but they are hearty and durable for the most part. He is able to get several suits and a lot of work clothes inside. Enough for a week's trip overseas! It really does for a lot of you pack economically. Plus, it is such a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This bag is great. I did read some really bad reviews about some bags that were only able to be used for one trip. Not this bag. It’s curable and the compartments for very nice the width of the Bag is great and I was able to put many outfits in it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: don't waste your
customer_reviews.text: Used one time on a cruise and the wheel broke off....don't waste your money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a business trip and I was surprised by how much could fit inside. I easily fit: 2 pairs of shoes a suit a sport coat 4 shirts 2 pants and still had room to spare! Great product for the price but I have only used it once so I can not comment on its durability.
customer_reviews.author: Luke matthews

customer_reviews.title: 4 stars is accurate for business travelers
customer_reviews.text: 4 stars is accurate for business travelers that will not use it every week. My luggage is all travelpro, but I wanted a cheap garment bag to leave at hotels. The only reason I mark it 4 instead of 5 stars is one zipper broke off after a month. Heavy and cheaply made, but does the trick and will hold up to 8 shirts, but it is larger than average. Great for a leave at the hotel bag but, not good for a bag that you will travel with every week.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Great for weekend trips!
customer_reviews.text: This is great for short trips. It's very sturdy, well made. I like the hanging bag/suitcase combo style....bc you know you're gonna need a couple hang up items. This keeps them unwrinkled. The down side to this bag is the room inside. It's good for a weekend trip.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Short term junk!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this bag 5 times. All but one zipper have issues or flat out broke. The tempered plastic to make it rigid is all broke out. This happens to luggage but after 5 uses I threw it out. 12 uses I would say oh well and not left a review but its not worth owning if you plan to check this bag through the airlines.
customer_reviews.author: THUNDER

customer_reviews.title: The luggage arrived in perfect shape and the clothing inside arrived perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I traveled to New York's LaGuardia and left from Newark Intl, 2 of the most crowded airports. The luggage arrived in perfect shape and the clothing inside arrived perfectly. I had the same experience on the return flight. I fully expected the zipper to break or something else to break, but everything worked as it should and it came back looking like new. I intend to take it again on my next trip, this time to Europe involving numerous flight changes. It is an amazing value at $37.
customer_reviews.author: jManners

customer_reviews.title: Just  average suitcase
customer_reviews.text: Not really large enough for full size garments to be folded. Is nice for jeans and other garments. A little challenging to have things in the suitcase section and the Garment section because of bulking. Lot a lot of room for long-term or a lot of clothing to pack
customer_reviews.author: Faye's Raves

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag for Us!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical after reading some of the reviews, but we're really simple and didn't need a high quality bag for what we had in mind, so I took a leap of faith and I love this bag! I was just looking for a super cheap garment bag for me and my husband to take our formal clothes in for a cruise and this was a winner. We put 3 of my dresses, 2 dress shirts of his and a full suit in it along with some miscellaneous shoes and what not. It worked fantastic. We won't be using it a ton, maybe once every few years solely for cruises and weddings and it is perfect for our needs!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: Expected sturdiness and quality for price. It's light so you're not adding a lot of weight unnecessarily . Wrinkling ultimately depends on how much you stuff it but overall it's better than folding it in a suitcase. Rolls fine.
customer_reviews.author: hari-bhari

customer_reviews.title: Meets my childrens military standards.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 1 for my military daughter for her uniform when traveling. It went through buses and airports.....no one problem. Very satisfied. Bought another for her military brother who also travels alot for liesure. Soon to purchase one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Phildunham

customer_reviews.title: This solves my problem! I'm an actress and I ...
customer_reviews.text: This solves my problem! I'm an actress and I work on set almost everyday. I need to bring wardrobe including accessories and shoes. This case has the right pockets and layers for all sorts of things I need to squeeze in there. And I can drag it. Other actors are asking where I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality bag. Seems heavy duty enough to be checked yet light enough to be carried on. We cruise alot and do not fly so I dont know about airline regulations. Works great for our dress clothes on our cruise. Hold 3 shirts and trhe pants with thin hangers with no problem. Plenty of room to put extras, shoes, socks, ties, betls, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy W.

customer_reviews.title: Decent solution, but not tough enough for the international travel.
customer_reviews.text: Within a 6 trips and rough handling by the airlines the material around the lower compartment has frayed, one of the zipper handles is broken, and it has a limp (one of the wheels does not roll smoothly). The clasp that secures the hangers inside is always popping open, so when I reach my destination the hangers are not secured...I've had to secure it with rubber bands or anything else to keep it closed. So, for the price it was not bad and it works. In the future I will be looking for something that can take the brutal handling a bit better.
customer_reviews.author: Cristian Rubio

customer_reviews.title: I was very disappointed. We literally had to go around the airport ...
customer_reviews.text: The bag arrived promptly, was able to use it for two trips and on the third trip the zipper broke. I was very disappointed. We literally had to go around the airport looking for tape to wrap around the suitcase so that our things would get lost on the connecting flight. I also want to mention that the bag was not even full to capacity, it just looks like the zipper is of poor quality. Unfortunately I will not be purchasing this again.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi Fayz

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised at how much I was able to pack into this rolling garment bag. I packed 3 suits, two pairs of dress shoes, toiletries and a weeks worth of casual clothes. Although this bag won't last forever; it a real winner for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Jr

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Damn Durable
customer_reviews.text: I just put this through the wringer on its first voyage out with packing nearly 45 pounds of cloths putting it through the worst that O'Hare, LAX, San Francisco and Boston could punish it and when I brought it home to unpack it looked brand new. For the cost it fared exceptional well...up against my really expensive luggage, even better.
customer_reviews.author: Gibbs

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a hanging bag!
customer_reviews.text: Read all the reviews which were mostly 4-5 stars. I'm very happy with my purchase. Just to pass on a good little item I learned is to use wrap each item in the bag in the plastic from the Dry Cleaners before putting in the bag....really helps.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hay

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice bag.
customer_reviews.text: I like it. The only problem is that the wheels do not turn 360. They are straight rollers, which makes it a little hard to handle for me. But I'm handicapped, it might not be a problem for others.
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Shows wear after one international flight, but plenty of room
customer_reviews.text: Used it on a trip to Scotland and it is already showing wear... :( It was plenty big enough for a suit, a sport coat, a pair of jeans, three dress shirts, a pair of slacks, socks and underwear. I would have given it five stars if it had not shown wear on the seams so quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Great for dancers
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my daughters costume during recitals and dance competitions. It keeps everything organized. Their are pockets to place other smaller items inside. Bobby Pins, hair bun accessories, dance shoes. It’s perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my spouse who was going on a trip to Michigan, the one he had was not going to cut it. Once it was delivered and taken out of the box it was perfect, I recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: MaMa Jean

customer_reviews.title: Very nice travel bag
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a recent cruise and it was very nice having something so durable for our hang up clothes, as with any bag there was some wrinkling of our clothes but overall it was very nice, we also love that it has wheels so you don't have to carry a garment bag around, it also has 2 pockets inside you can put things in, I did not realize this, so it was a nice surprise when I opened it up. We love it..
customer_reviews.author: Mseener60

customer_reviews.title: Avoid unless you only intend to carry a light weight shirt.
customer_reviews.text: It made exactly half a trip before the upper holding bar came apart. I was able to find and fix it but it is flimsy not to be trusted. I checked a similar product at a local store and the manufacturer had a much more substantial part. Poorly designed. I would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Little

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Read a few reviews that made me sceptical; however, this bag served my 3 day trip well with three suits, two pair of shoes and skivvys. Also had plenty of room for hygiene and miscellaneous items. The extended handle was long enough to pull without the bag running over my foot and I'm 5' 11". Lastly, handle made a great place to slip on the laptop bag for easy storage!
customer_reviews.author: Irvinfitz

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this over a year and used it many times. It's perfect for travel. My work clothes don't get wrinkled. I have plenty of room for all that I need. It's a sturdy bag that holds up well, even as checked luggage when flying. The wheels roll nicely and hold up well. I plan to buy another as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the price!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is wonderful for the price. Everything fits well, rolls smooth, hide away handle and shoulder strap. Quality is good. May not last a lifetime, especially with baggage handlers but I think it will hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: AmyD

customer_reviews.title: Not Durable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag to replace my old bag. On my first travel with this bag, it was busted open. I would not recommend not durable at all.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Good for occassional use.
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for a week's worth of business attire. It has a good amount of space for toiletries, shoes, and other items. It does feel cheaply made with thin plastic, weak zippers, and a fragile plastic hanger. However, I pulled this all around New York for a week and it held up fine. If you are going to use your garmet bag often, I would spend more money to get a better bag. But if you will only use it once or twice a year I recommend this bag for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Well designed and priced right for a garment bag.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a garment bag for uniform garments. This bag has everything I needed. I don’t know how this bad would hold up with Airline baggage Handlers. For my needs this is the best and the price was right.
customer_reviews.author: John J. Brunette

customer_reviews.title: Great garment bag! Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Didn't think this was going to work out when it arrived however I was very pleased with this bag,it held 2 suits and several (7) dress shirts, ties, shirts socks, underwear and a pair of shoes! All arrived in place and no touch up ironing required! Its a keeper! Quality held up well!
customer_reviews.author: momcares

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for something like this for a long time. Great product. First garment bag I've bought that you don't have to re-iron pants and shirts after traveling. Had three slacks and three shirts. There was room to pack an extra pair of shoes along with everything else I needed for a three day trip. There was room for more. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Brian G.

customer_reviews.title: For carrying dresses to wedding
customer_reviews.text: Have not used the bag yet but feel it will fill our desire to carry 3 long dresses to a wedding. Will comment more later.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha

customer_reviews.title: Durable Product at Reasonable Price
customer_reviews.text: Held 3 suits, casual clothes, 2 pairs of shoes and toiletries, and withstood travel across 3 continents. Very impressed with durability and cost - half the price of my last travel bag and is holding up much better. A+
customer_reviews.author: ADB

customer_reviews.title: Don't do it!!
customer_reviews.text: Must be a cheap knockoff of a better bag, it seems to be built upside down. When the bag is hanging over a door, the mesh storage compartment zipper is on the bottom of the compartment. The two small storage bags in the corners are held by Velcro and snaps that WILL NOT snap. I would like a full refund!
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Norton

customer_reviews.title: Good choice for limited use
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Good weekend bag. Traveled from west coast to Midwest for 4 day weekend. 2 suits ,4 shirts ,ties, undies, and socks. Had a carryon for the rest of my needs. You can tell it’s less expensive made from zippers but it works good for limited use. I may get something more sturdy for longer trips. Not a spinner
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: GREAT GARMENT BAG
customer_reviews.text: I bought this garment bag for our upcoming trip to Europe. A little shorter in size than I would have liked, but it's a great garment bag for the price. Hopefully it will hold up for our trip. The material seems to be very sturdy, and I also like the additional outside pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra L. Tutalo

customer_reviews.title: Acceptable for price
customer_reviews.text: Acceptable for the price. It is something that may get used once a year for my wife when we take a cruise. She can fit a few dresses in it with no problem. Doesn't have as sturdy feel a a quality one I have for business but didn't even come close to the cost. Needed the extra bag in a hurry. Shipping was quick price was right. No regrets on purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for the price
customer_reviews.text: Since I've purchased it it has made two trips both by air. And has stood up to baggage handlers and conveyor belts like a champ. I never expected a $40 piece of luggage to do so well.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Raudsep

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves that this garment bag. The fact that he can put his suits in and simply fold the bag is great. The fact that it is on wheels is even more of a plus. This is a real usable product.
customer_reviews.author: 3Pete9

customer_reviews.title: Great construction but poor handle for pulling.
customer_reviews.text: Really good suit or shirt packing but slide out handle sucks. Will not lock in place. The construction is great, the pair of wheels are OK. But it can only trail you, you cannot push or handle just slides back into the holder. The pick up main handle is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J. McGrath

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for travelers.
customer_reviews.text: have used it a few times and works great, easy way to keep clothes in good condition while traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Marco Antonio Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Great if you are only using it a few times.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for a last minute trip that required a suit and I wanted to use something better than just a normal garment bag. I figure this bag given that it has wheels would be a good bet. While I will admit the price was downright cheap I soon figured out why. The latch at the top to hold in hangers did not close well and the bag has quite literally started falling apart at the seams after my only second use of it. I also wish to echo the advice of others in that this bag does not fit into overhead bins so be prepared to pay.
customer_reviews.author: Dnitzer

customer_reviews.title: Garment bag is nice and sleek for future travels
customer_reviews.text: I like the garment bag. It is a nice upgrade from the shoulder strap carrier type I have, which will now be donated to a local charity. The additional pockets in front and inside also make it easier to pack more in one place, reducing the chances of not having to buy a 26 inch or larger suitcase (I may still get a 20-24 inch case as time goes on).
customer_reviews.author: ScipioIV

customer_reviews.title: AmsterDAM impressed
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a quick fix to my dress clothes travel problems. I was jamming my dress clothes into a rolling duffle bag, and ironing them when I got to my hotel. This was not the best way to handle business. So, I ordered up the Travel Select Luggage Amsterdam Business Rolling Garment Bag to help me save me from myself. You can color me AmsterDAM impressed with this product. I am able to take a weeks worth of clothing with me, wrinkle free. It saves me at least three hours each week with not having to iron my clothes again.
customer_reviews.author: Chronic_Truth

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for cruises
customer_reviews.text: I was a little leery about buying this for my trip because the reviews were mixed. It lasted, easy to use and I love it
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Seifert

customer_reviews.title: Good capacity great for air travel
customer_reviews.text: Nice and sturdy fits all my needs for 3-4 nights including toiletries will need to be checked in. Used twice no issues
customer_reviews.author: Bharat Mans

customer_reviews.title: Worth trying, may not last long
customer_reviews.text: Ordered gray, received black but I decided it's not worth sending back for the color. The pull handle is fragile-it may not survive being handled by airport workers. The size is good for holding a good amount of clothes, unfortunately it will have to be checked baggage. For the price I think it's worth keeping but may have to be replaced for mediocre quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kxladybug

customer_reviews.title: Great but for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price! I used it to keep my uniforms wrinkle free while I traveled across the US and it work perfectly! There was added pockets that allowed me to put my accessories in and my dress shoes and it rolled pretty smoothly. My only dislike is that it doesn’t have 4 wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Raissa Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Fits a great deal of clothes and stuff. Great buy for the price , love the wheels makes it awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Inspectorz

customer_reviews.title: This was perfect for what we needed.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to take on a cruise it worked really well. Held a lot of clothes. Made it so easy just to pull them out and hang them up.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen M.

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. It is just what we needed. Excellent given the price. Durability might be an issue if checked a lot at airport. Much of our travel has been by train. But we are very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Completely adequate
customer_reviews.text: This is a fully adequate garment bag. I bought it as a cheap replacement for a much better model lost in a move. This is sturdy enough for most casual travellers, but I doubt it will stand up to the amount of travel I do. The outer is solid, and the wheels, and other hardware, seem well-made. However, this case lacks an inner-zipped cover, and it hangs from the bottom (wheel side). I don't think it was designed to be packed or unpacked while hanging, since the inside pocked upens downward when it is hanging. Adequate for the price.
customer_reviews.author: M. Friedman

customer_reviews.title: Superb Bag
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this in April for a Trip to DC to attend a Black-Tie wedding. The bag was Perfect, held all necessary items just as expected. Bag itself Made it through the trip without a scratch and still looking brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Kimsuekids

customer_reviews.title: My Garment Roller Bag
customer_reviews.text: I like this rolling garnet bag. I use it for traveling. I wish it was a couple inches smaller so I can use it as a carry on. I hope it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Dudley Thomas

product_meta.title: Travel Select Amsterdam Business Rolling Garment Bag, Black, One Size
product_meta.description: Size:One Size| Color:BlackThe travel select Amsterdam business rolling garment bag is ideal for keeping your clothes crisp and clean while you are traveling. This garment bag is made of industrial quality hardware; 1200d two-tone polyester construction with an EVA reinforced front panel. It features an internal handle system, inline skate wheels, and an adjustable and detachable shoulder strap with a non-slip pad. It has a spacious main compartment with zippered mesh pockets and multiple outside gusseted pockets for easy packing. The convenient tie straps secure items while the fold-out design helps to reduce wrinkles in suits. Plus, the top carry handle is designed for easy lifting and center strap is built in for carrying extra bag. Size: 23"w x 22"h (44" opened) x 7"d 9.3 Lbs.
feature_bullets: Made of 1200D 2-Tone polyester front panel w/ EVA reinforcement
Adjustable and detachable shoulder strap with non-slip pad; Dimensions: 23"L x 22"W (44"W when opened) x 7"H
Corner protected in-line skate wheels, Bag Linear Inches: 12 linear inches
Spacious main compartment with zippered mesh pockets
Elegantly imprinted interior lining and tie straps to secure items

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars1,893 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
